Sentencas: A microgrid, with little environmental impact, is developed by introducing a combined SOFC (solid oxide fuel cell) and PEFC (proton exchange membrane fuel cell) system.
Titulo: Power generation efficiency of an SOFC-PEFC combined system with time shift utilization of SOFC exhaust heat

Sentencas: Although the SOFC requires a higher operation temperature compared to the PEFC, the power generation efficiency of the SOFC is higher.
Titulo: Power generation efficiency of an SOFC-PEFC combined system with time shift utilization of SOFC exhaust heat

Sentencas: However, if high temperature exhaust heat may be used effectively, a system with higher total power generation efficiency can be built.
Titulo: Power generation efficiency of an SOFC-PEFC combined system with time shift utilization of SOFC exhaust heat

Sentencas: Therefore, this paper investigates the operation of a SOFC-PEFC combined system, with time shift operation of reformed gas, into a microgrid with 30 houses in Sapporo, Japan.
Titulo: Power generation efficiency of an SOFC-PEFC combined system with time shift utilization of SOFC exhaust heat

Sentencas: The SOFC is designed to correspond to base load operation, and the exhaust heat of the SOFC is used for production of reformed gas.
Titulo: Power generation efficiency of an SOFC-PEFC combined system with time shift utilization of SOFC exhaust heat

Sentencas: This reformed gas is used for the production of electricity for the PEFC, corresponding to fluctuation load of the next day.
Titulo: Power generation efficiency of an SOFC-PEFC combined system with time shift utilization of SOFC exhaust heat

Sentencas: Accordingly, the reformed gas is used with a time shift operation.
Titulo: Power generation efficiency of an SOFC-PEFC combined system with time shift utilization of SOFC exhaust heat

Sentencas: In this paper, the relation between operation method, power generation efficiency, and amount of heat storage of the SOFC-PEFC combined system to the difference in power load pattern was investigated.
Titulo: Power generation efficiency of an SOFC-PEFC combined system with time shift utilization of SOFC exhaust heat

Sentencas: The average power generation efficiency of the system can be maintained at nearly 48% on a representative day in February (winter season) and August (summer season).
Titulo: Power generation efficiency of an SOFC-PEFC combined system with time shift utilization of SOFC exhaust heat
